channel.title: Diaries on Ducci Personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Diaries on Ducci Personal blog

item.title: A March day
item.description: What I did today? Follow laboratori of Architettura degli elaboratori ✔️ Crypt my USB- Key ✔️ I still have to figure out, how make it work with Windows Tho, for now it works only on Linux dd bs=4K if=/dev/urandom of=/dev/sdX1 slap that usb, It can conteins so much random data cryptsetup -h sha256 -c aes-xts-plain -s 256 luksFormat /dev/sdX1 lets encrypt the Usb

item.title: First entry in the diary
item.description: So, what I have to do today? Follow Analisi 1 lecture Follow Architettura degli elaboratori lecture What happend that I didn’t expect: Election of the rappresentatives of my section of University I had to vote which people has to manage the place What will I do on the job: Configurate a lot of smartphone for some co-workers Extraction of data for clients When I was returning home:
